metadata.synopsis: Raphael has appeared to give the player the Orphic hammer after they just betrayed the Emperor. The player likely has no other options, and Raphael has little patience. He stands near Orpheus, observing his shackled condition.
metadata.how_to_trigger: load END_Mainoe end_startillithidoptionsAttack the Emperor when he is standing by OepheusWait for Raphael to appear

0.speaker: Raphael
0.text: Tick tock. You can't avoid talking to me forever. Didn't your mother ever tell you not to keep a devil waiting?

1.speaker: Raphael
1.text: Such power in such a weak package. A prince no less.

2.speaker: Raphael
2.text: Those shackles look rather fetching on you, Orpheus. Shame about the imprisonment.

3.speaker: Raphael
3.text: Still in denial, are we? Cute. But you can't avoid me forever. You need me.
